successes.title: SONTE: iPhone/iPad Android DIY WiFi Digital Shades
successes.description: Easy to install SONTE Film fits on existing windows, controls natural light settings and provides UV protection for energy savings.

Pledges.description: Pledge $1 and keep up-to-date on all things SONTE with exclusive updates on SONTE Film availability and more. You can also sign up for more updates at http://www.sonte.com/newsletter
SON-Tee. An exclusive Kickstarter only SONTE team t-shirt using UV sensitive fabric that changes color with UV light.
[Add $6 to ship within the US (lower 48 states)]
CONNECTOR KIT - extra connectors for daisy chaining.  You will receive four connectors and cables - a discount from the $45 retail price we’re currently planning.
[Free shipping if pledged with one of the SONTE Film rewards, otherwise ADD $2 for shipping (includes worldwide shipping)]

DAISY CHAIN ACCESSORY PACK - If you have already pledged for a SONTE Film and wanted to cut it to smaller sizes to install on a series of windows, this package will allow you to daisy chain.  You will receive two connectors and cables and one non Wi-Fi transformer - a discount from the $65 retail price we’re currently planning. (NON WI-FI: controlled with a switch).
[Free shipping if pledged with one of the SONTE Film rewards, otherwise ADD $5 for shipping (includes worldwide shipping)]

DAISY CHAIN ACCESSORY PACK - If you have already pledged for a SONTE Film and wanted to cut it to smaller sizes to install on a series of windows, this package will allow you to daisy chain.  You will receive two connectors and cables and one Wi-Fi transformer - a discount from the $89 retail price we’re currently planning. (WI-FI: controlled with smartphone).
[Free shipping if pledged with one of the SONTE Film rewards, otherwise ADD $5 for shipping (includes worldwide shipping)]

SPECIAL "GIVE-IT-A-TRY" SIZE. Only available on Kickstarter, you will receive our special size 50cm x 50cm (1.64 ft. x 1.64 ft.) SONTE Film and installation kit (non Wi-Fi transformer) for $65. (NON WI-FI: controlled with a switch)
[Add $15 to ship within the US (lower 48 states)]

SONTE FILM VIVID. This is our line of colored SONTE Film. For Kickstarter, you will receive our special size 50cm x 50cm (1.64 ft. x 1.64 ft.) SONTE Film in RED and installation kit (non Wi-Fi transformer) for $99. (NON WI-FI: controlled with a switch) 
[Add $15 to ship within the US (lower 48 states)]

SONTE FILM BLACK. This is our line of dark colored SONTE Film for those who want to block out more light. For Kickstarter, you will receive our special size 50cm x 50cm (1.64 ft. x 1.64 ft.) SONTE Film in BLACK and installation kit (non Wi-Fi transformer) for $99. (NON WI-FI: controlled with a switch)
[Add $15 to ship within the US (lower 48 states)]

EARLY BIRD. For being one of the first 100 to support SONTE, you will receive our 1 x 1 meter (3.28 ft. x 3.28 ft.) SONTE Film and installation kit (non Wi-Fi transformer) for $184 - a discount from the $250 retail price we’re currently planning. (NON WI-FI: controlled with a switch).
[Add $25 to ship within the US (lower 48 states)]
You will receive our 1m x 1m (3.28 ft. x 3.28 ft.) SONTE Film and installation kit (non Wi-Fi transformer) for $199. (NON WI-FI: controlled with a switch).
[Add $25 to ship within the US (lower 48 states)]

EARLY BIRD. For being one of the first 100 to support SONTE, you will receive our 1 x 1 meter (3.28 ft. x 3.28 ft.) SONTE Film and installation kit (Wi-Fi transformer) for $219 - a discount from the $280 retail price we’re currently planning. (WI-FI: controlled with smartphone).
[Add $25 to ship within the US (lower 48 states)]
